item.title: Local
item.description: Kaohsiung The conference will be held in Kaohsiung, where convenient transportation systems such as Kaohsiung Metro, Light Rail, YouBike, buses connects almost everywhere. Uber with reasonable price is also available. More information will be added later.

item.title: Plan your trip
item.description: Visa Many countries are eligible for the visa exemption program, with a duration of stay of up to 90 days. In general, you may follow the instructions of the Bureau of Consular Affairs to apply for a visa. Airport Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport (TPE) is the primary airport of Taiwan and is an important hub in Asia. Most people arrive to Taiwan through this airport. With fewer flight options, Kaohsiung International Airport (KHH) is the closest airport to the conference venue.

item.title: Welcoming and Inclusiveness Statement
item.description: The ILAS2025 organizing team will adhere to the Welcoming and Inclusiveness Statement of ILAS and make the conference an friendly environment for all. Welcoming and Inclusiveness Statement The International Linear Algebra Society (ILAS) is comprised of a diverse global membership. It is the policy of ILAS to offer a welcoming and inclusive environment to all participants in its activities, including all its meetings and conferences, regardless of gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion or religious belief, age, marital status, disabilities, and field of expertise.
